Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Allen, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy a ten (10) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the Parish (an estimated $930,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of supporting the general fund?

Race.SpecificTitle: Sales Tax Dist. No. 1 -- 0.3% S&U Tax - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Sales Tax District No. 1 Proposition
(Sales Tax)
Race.FullText: Shall Sales Tax District No. 1 of the Parish of Allen, State of Louisiana (the "District") whose boundaries encompass the Parish of Allen less and except those areas encompassed within the Town of Elizabeth, the Town of Kinder, the Town of Oakdale, the Town of Oberlin and the Village of Reeves, be authorized to levy and collect for a period of ten (10) years from and after April 1, 2017, a tax of three-tenths of one percent (0.3%) (the "Tax") upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption, and the storage for use or consumption, of tangible personal property and on sales of services within the District as defined by law (an estimated $280,000 expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), with the proceeds thereof (after paying the expenses of collecting and administering the Tax), to be dedicated for constructing, improving and maintaining roads, bridges and drainage systems within the District?
